edu.colorado.cires.cmg.awszarr

Interface S3ClientWrapper

  • All Superinterfaces:
    edu.colorado.cires.cmg.s3out.S3ClientMultipartUpload
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AwsS3ClientWrapper, FileMockS3ClientWrapper

    public interface S3ClientWrapper
extends edu.colorado.cires.cmg.s3out.S3ClientMultipartUpload
    A wrapper around the S3Client from the AWS SDK v2. This allows for calls to the S3Client to be mocked for testing or allow for customization

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static S3ClientWrapper createDefault(software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3.S3Client s3)
      Creates a default instance of a S3ClientWrapper that works in most scenarios.
      void deleteObject(String bucket, String key)
      Deletes a file from a S3 bucket.
      Optional<InputStream> getObject(String bucket, String key)
      Returns an Optional that wraps an InputStream for reading a file from a S3 bucket.
      Stream<software.amazon.awssdk.services.s3.model.ListObjectsV2Response> listObjectsV2Paginator(String bucket, String prefix)
      Returns a Stream representing the contents of a S3 bucket

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.colorado.cires.cmg.s3out.S3ClientMultipartUpload

        abortMultipartUpload, completeMultipartUpload, createMultipartUpload, uploadPart

      • getObject

        Optional<InputStream> getObject(String bucket,
                                String key)
        Returns an Optional that wraps an InputStream for reading a file from a S3 bucket. An empty Optional will be returned if the file does not exist.
        Parameters:
        bucket - the bucket name
        key - a S3 key
        Returns:
        an Optional that wraps an InputStream for reading a file from a S3 backed zarr store

      • deleteObject

        void deleteObject(String bucket,
                  String key)
        Deletes a file from a S3 bucket.

        key - a S3 key

                                                                                              String prefix)
        Returns a Stream representing the contents of a S3 bucket
        Parameters:
        bucket - the bucket name
        prefix - filters the results such that all objects start with this prefix
        Returns:
        a Stream representing the contents of a S3 bucket
